item.title: Street lights not working, 18th January
item.description:
There are at least 5 street lights not working outside Co op and heading towards Pope Street. It's making the area very dark, particularly over the railway bridge. We have noticed lights not working on Green Lane recently too and reported them. Not sure why they keep being turned off?!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Novar Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrect signage at roadworks, 18th January
item.description:
Cadent Roadworks in Caledonian Road, they have closed the exit to north road BUT THEY HAVE PUT THE ‘ROAD CLOSED’ SIGNS AT THE WRONG END OF THE ROAD - all the signs at the exit end!! There are No warning or closed signs where the traffic usually enters!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Caledonian Road, Holloway, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: External building lights not on at sundown, 18th January
item.description:
Hackney Council's Well Street building's external lights do not go on at the same time as the other builds. It's 5:4pm and in complete darkness. This is a daily occurrence. Please program lights to turn on at sun down.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Well Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
